HELP_COOP: If you have a keyboard, you can start a 2-player co-op game by pressing the "2" key.
HELP_EGGS: Pick up the eggs before they hatch.
HELP_FLAP: To fly, repeatedly press the "flap" button or press the space bar.
HELP_FLY: Pressing left or right while flapping will accelerate in that direction.
HELP_JOYSTICK: Drag the joystick or use the arrow keys on your keyboard to run left and right.
HELP_SAFETY: Temporary safety until a control is pressed.
HELP_START: Touch the coin to start a single-player game.
HELP_SURVIVE: To survive a joust, the highest lance wins in a collision.
